Index du paquetage

Toutes les fonctions

block_tnt()
Tnt by block
check_daily_meteo()
Check if meteo data are daily or hourly
check_heteroscedasticity()
Bartlett on residuals
check_normality()
Residual normality test
check_plotid_diff()
Check differences in plot_id
check_pom_csv()
Check for required columns in a data frame
check_standard_file()
Check if the file provided is a xlsx standardised file
check_topvigne_csv()
Check if a CSV file is in TopVigne format
check_xptrtcode_diff()
Check differences in xp_trt_code
efficacy()
Calcul of efficacy according to the Abbott's formula
export_data_sheets()
Export observation sheets into a new Excel file version
find_vars()
Look star variables in a dataframe
getdataframe()
Extract dataframe from an user_data object by his name (looking in obs_data and prepared_data)
get_template_excel()
get_template_excel
harmonize_column_types()
Harmonize Column Types
harmonize_plot_id_format()
Harmonize plot_id format to match placette (e.g. 10A to A10)
ht_efficacy()
Calcul efficacy according to the Henderson and Tilton formula
import_pom_csv()
Import meteo data from a EPICURE POM csv file
incidence()
calculation of disease incidence
intensity()
calculation of disease intensity
load_data_sheets()
Import "data_*" sheets from an Excel file into a user_data object
load_default_dictionary()
load default dictionary
load_excel_file()
Load data from an standardized Excel file into R environment
load_metadata_sheets()
Load Metadata Sheets from Excel Trial File
load_meteo()
Load meteo data from Excel sheet
merge_data_plotdesc()
Merged a dataset with plot description
merge_data_xpdesc()
Merged a dataset with experimental treatment description
nearest_tnt()
Find nearest tnt from plot
obsnames()
Names of data observations available in an user_data objetc
order_factor_levels_numeric_last()
Ordering factors
plot_meteo()
Plot ombrothermic meteo chart
plot_xpbar()
Barplot summary for an experiment
plot_xpheat()
Plot a Heatmap of Experimental Data
prepare_data()
Prepare data
prepare_excel_model()
Prepare Excel Trial File from Template
prpnames()
Names of data observations available in an user_data objetc
qq_residual_plot()
Q-Q plot of residuals
resume_pivot_wider()
Pivot wider a resume dataframe
save_data_to_excel()
Save Combined Data to a Versioned Excel File
severity_diseased()
calculation of disease severity
standardise_data()
Standardize an experimental data file or data frame
standardise_pom_csv()
Standardisation of POM csv file
standardise_topvigne_csv()
Standardize a raw TopVigne CSV file
statsnames()
Names of stats available in an user_data objetc
stat_on_data()
Statistic pipeline for data analysis
test_stats()
Perform ANOVA or Kruskal-Wallis test and group comparison
to_posix()
Convert heterogeneous date/time inputs to POSIXct (UTC)
wrapper_data()
Wrapper to load all relevant data for plotting
write_log()
Write log to Excel file
